name: 4 Day Choquequirao Trek And Machu Picchu Tour
description: Choquequirao is considered by many as the "sister city" of the famous Machu Picchu. This trek combines four days of hiking to Choquequirao with a train trip to Machu Picchu, allowing you to see two of the most historically important sites that the Incas created. During this trek, you will see spectacular Andean scenery along with amazing Incan architecture. This trek is extremely challenging, and is considered a unique, rare and exciting adventure into the past of the Incas. This trek is perfect for those who enjoy a challenge and want to explore amazing sites off the beaten path.
